timeline.bodyText: You can use StandardCharsets instead of guava.
timeline.author: kevinleturc

timeline.bodyText: You can use var to declare only once ArrayList (and to avoid implementation type declaration for List).
timeline.author: kevinleturc

timeline.bodyText: LogManager from log4j2 should be used instead.
timeline.author: kevinleturc
kevinleturc

timeline.bodyText: String.join from JDK can be used.
timeline.author: kevinleturc

timeline.bodyText: This test seems a bit too optimist; as everything starting by readme matches. Like readme-test.md, readme-sample.ascidoc, etc.
timeline.author: akervern

replies.bodyText:
Indeed, i had kept the old logics but i changed it so that it better represents what's extracted.
Note that in practice "readme-sample.ascidoc" would not be retrieved by the maven plugin configuration, though, and that readme-test.md is actually accepted.
Note also that in practice, here's what we have in the nuxeo repository:
modules/runtime/nuxeo-runtime-stream/README.md
modules/runtime/nuxeo-stream/README.md
modules/runtime/nuxeo-runtime-metrics/README.md
